settings.code:
About Z Grills

The best pellet grills in the market, awarded by top media websites like CNET, Forbes, GoodHousekeeping, and ConsumerReports. With 30+ years of experience manufacturing grills for top brands, we founded Z Grills in 2016, quickly becoming one of the most respected names in the industry.

Our mission? Democratizing high-end, professional outdoor cookers to bring unforgettable flavors to every backyard and beyond. Join us and experience epic meals outdoors like never before.

MEET OUR AMBASSADORS

★★★★★

NIJIA GARCIA
Software Engineer & BBQ'er

In 2015 I purchased a Z-Grill and it was my first love affair with pellet grills and since that I try it all on it. The convenience and easy usage of this grill is abode any other and a blessing in disguise. Reliable, easy to learn and maintain and tough as hell is how I would describe this grill and there is nothing that may change my mind on it.

★★★★★

NICK DOMPIERRE
BBQ Pit Master

My experience with Z Grills is a 10/10! I have the Backyard Warrior 7002c2e model. I received the grill in a box shipped to my door. I assembled it with their easy-to-follow instructions. Cooking with the grill was really awesome. It's amazing how the heat evenly distributes so well. I love how it has the option for high heat grilling or slow smoking. I really wish I discovered Z Grills sooner.

★★★★★

THOMAS SCARANO
Pitmaster

I own both the Z Grills 700D4E and 450B, both of which are equipped with a state-of-the-art PID controller. This advanced technology ensures that the temperature stays precisely at your desired set point, resulting in consistently great cooking results every single time.

★★★★★

CHUCK M
Pitmaster

I've cooked on a lot of different pellet grills over the years, but what really caught my attention about the Z Grills was how consistent and flavorful the results were, all at an amazing price point. Don't get me wrong, I have respect for all the other grill manufacturers out there, but for me, the Z Grills stands out for its reliability and consistency. With my Z Grills, I've made everything from brisket to cheesecakes, and it has never let me down. There's nothing it can't do.

MORE AMBASSADORS

settings.testimonial: Outstanding smoke flavor and even cooking. I chose the Zgrills pellet grill because I trust the product. The grill offered more than I expected. There are no hidden factors. The pid controls are user friendly. Disassemble the easy parts. Use a brush on the wasted material. Put the parts back in place. That's it. Sweet! I recommend this product.
settings.author: Breck O.

settings.testimonial: Very good. I have cooked on Mak grills, Camp Chef, Green Mountain and Pit Boss and of course Traeger. This is my favorite grill. Easy to clean. Works perfectly. The PID controller with smoke mode is a winner. Fit and finish is excellent. I will only own a Z Grill from now on. You just can't beat the price with the quality of the grill.
settings.author: scott e.

settings.testimonial: ZG used to build the Traeger. Some products are interchangeable. Traeger is too high priced. They cook the same.
settings.author: Don Ferron

settings.testimonial: I had a Treager and it was great but my Z is just as great & bigger hopper and not nearly as expensive.
settings.author: Frank Huber

settings.testimonial: So far I love this smoker. I wanted one with a PID controller to help better control my temperature. I’ve only smoked pork belly burnt ends and ribs so far. I’m actually in the process of smoking a brisket for Super Bowl. Smelling so good. It’s easy to clean and easy to use. Very happy with it so far.
settings.author: Thomas G.

settings.testimonial: Wifi feature works well. The first time I connected to Wi-Fi, I needed to use the network and turn on Bluetooth to connect to the app. The first time was very successful, and every subsequent use even if I don't have a network, I can use the Wi-Fi function normally, but remember to turn on the Bluetooth to connect to the app. This thing is the awesome product for smoking meat! Absolutely phenomenal product, great customer service, keeps heat beautifully, smokes like no other....so glad I ordered it wihout regret. The wifi and bt work perfectly, no issues and the probes are dead nuts accurate. I love this guy!
settings.author: Phillip D.

settings.testimonial: After researching pellet smokers for almost 3 weeks, I finally pulled the Zgrills on the 700D4E. It has blown my expectations away, from the durable build quality, ease of use, and flawless operation. If you are on the fence as I was, save yourself some wasted time, rip off the band-aid, and buy one! Honest review, from a genuinely satisfied customer.
settings.author: Breck O.

settings.testimonial:
Z-GRILLS PORTABLE PELLET GRILL CRUISER 200A, HONEST REVIEW

Tried out the Cruiser on a Cold January Wisconsin Day! I was impressed! The burn in went great, set to 375 and it got to 380 for an hour. Then reduced temp to 250 and prepared some homemade Meatloaf! Meatloaf on for about 3 hours, temps held very nicely! Sauced it up and increased temp to 325 for about 15 minutes!

I was very impressed! The Z-Grills Cruiser portable pellet grill performed well and the Smoked Meat Loaf had an Awesome Smoke Ring!

Nicely done by Z-Grills!
settings.author: Tom H.

settings.testimonial: Bought my dad the same model Z Grill as myself for an early Father’s Day gift and now we can trade recipes and bond over this new hobby despite the distance apart. These grills have been an excellent addition to our grilling fleet and really well built for our adverse Montana weather. They are simple to understand and operate. Definitely enjoying the 450 pros!
settings.author: Dustin G.

settings.title: OVER 85 MILLION COOKS WITH Z GRILLS

settings.code:
Jackery Solar Generator

1000 | 500 | 300 | 240

Jackery Solar Generators are the ideal, lightweight, and safe power solution for camping, hiking, and fishing. The large and small solar generators provide a range of capacity options to charge different appliances, like a CPAP machine, laptop, refrigerator, and sump pump. They are on-the-go power generators, compact enough to carry when enjoying your outdoor activities.
